## Featured Projects

### DMR Signal Decoding
Monitoring digital mobile radio (DMR) using RTL-SDR and Python. Real-time decoding and dashboard integration.

### Building Footprint Visualization with DuckDB
Efficient rendering and querying of 24M+ buildings using spatial DuckDB, `sf`, and `rgee` in R.

### NOAA Satellite Image Automation
Processing, decoding and overlaying weather satellite imagery on maps using bash and Python tools.
